title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom component exposing Ollama as a conversation agent.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama’s REST API with async/await.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing a chat interface and REST endpoints backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio-based async client and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI fork adding Ollama as an inference backend option.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using Ollama models.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing Ollama with OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that queries local Ollama models via Bolt framework.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama.
